flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
A special fluid
oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark
its territory.

Once it becomes an
adult, it has a
tendency to let its comrades plant
footprints on its
back.

The color of the
mysterious fluid
secreted from its tail is predeter­
mined for each
SMEARGLE.

SMEARGLE marks the boundaries of its
territory using a body fluid that leaks
out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this
POKéMON have been found.

SMEARGLE marks the boundaries of its
territory using a body fluid that leaks
out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different marks left by this
POKéMON have been found.

A SMEARGLE marks its territory using a
fluid that leaks out from the tip of its
tail. About 5,000 different marks left by
this POKéMON have been found.

Once it becomes an adult, it has a
tendency to let its comrades plant
footprints on its back.

A special fluid oozes from the tip of its
tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to
mark its territory.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

A special fluid oozes from the tip
of its tail. It paints the fluid
everywhere to mark its territory.

Once it becomes an adult, it has a
tendency to let its comrades plant
footprints on its back.

Il marque son territoire en maniant
sa queue comme un pinceau. On
dénombre plus de 5 000 marques.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

Il marque son territoire en maniant
sa queue comme un pinceau. On
dénombre plus de 5 000 marques.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

It marks its territory by using its
tail like a paintbrush. There are
more than 5,000 different marks.

しっぽを　ふでのように　つかって
なわばりに　マークを　えがく。
その　しゅるいは　５０００いじょう。

꼬리를 붓처럼 써서
영역에 마크를 그린다.
그 종류는 5000개 이상이다.

Il marque son territoire en maniant sa queue comme
un pinceau. On dénombre plus de 5 000 marques.

Sein Revier markiert es mit seinem pinselartigen
Schweif. Es kennt mehr als 5 000 Markierungen.

Marca su territorio usando su cola a modo de pincel.
Ha hecho más de 5000 marcas diferentes.

Delimita il suo territorio usando la coda come se fosse
un pennello. Ha lasciato oltre 5000 segni diversi.

It marks its territory by using its tail like a
paintbrush. There are more than 5,000
different marks.

尻尾を　筆のように　使って
縄張りを　マークで　描く。
その　種類は　５０００以上。

おとなになると　なかまから
せなかに　あしあとの　マークを
つけられる　しゅうせいを　もつ。

어른이 되면 동료로부터
등에 발자국 마크를
받는 습성을 가진다.

Arrivé à l’âge adulte, il laisse ses camarades poser
leur empreinte de patte sur son dos.

Ist es erwachsen, lässt es sich gern von seinen
Kameraden Fußabdrücke auf den Rücken setzen.

Cuando llega a adulto, suele dejar que sus camaradas
dejen sus huellas sobre su lomo.

Quando è adulto tende a farsi lasciare orme di zampe
sul dorso dai propri compagni.

Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let
its comrades plant footprints on its back.

大人になると　仲間から
背中に　足跡の　マークを
つけられる　習性を　持つ。

しっぽの　さきから　にじみでる　たいえきで
なわばりの　まわりに　じぶんの　マークを　かく。
５０００　しゅるいの　マークが　みつかっている。

꼬리 끝에서 배어 나오는 체액으로
영역 주변에 자신의 마크를 그린다.
5000종의 마크가 발견됐다.

Queulorior délimite son territoire en libérant un fluide corporel
qui sort de sa queue. On a découvert plus de 5 000 traces
différentes de fluide laissées par ce Pokémon.

Farbeagle markiert sein Revier mit einer Flüssigkeit,
die aus seiner Schweifspitze austritt. Es wurden über
5 000 unterschiedliche Markierungen entdeckt,
die dieses Pokémon hinterlassen hat.

Smeargle marca los límites de su territorio liberando un fluido
corporal por el extremo de la cola. En la actualidad se han
encontrado más de 5000 tipos de marcas distintas dejadas
por este Pokémon.

Smeargle delimita i confini del suo territorio con il fluido
corporeo secreto dalla punta della coda. Sono state
rinvenute ben 5000 diverse delimitazioni lasciate
da questo Pokémon.

Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body
fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different
marks left by this Pokémon have been found.

尻尾の　先から　にじみ出る　体液で
縄張りの　周りに　自分の　マークを　描く。
５０００　種類の　マークが　見つかっている。

しっぽの　さきから　にじみでる　たいえきで
なわばりの　まわりに　じぶんの　マークを　かく。
５０００　しゅるいの　マークが　みつかっている。

꼬리 끝에서 배어 나오는 체액으로
영역 주변에 자신의 마크를 그린다.
5000종의 마크가 발견됐다.

Queulorior délimite son territoire en libérant un fluide corporel
qui sort de sa queue. On a découvert plus de 5 000 traces
différentes de fluide laissées par ce Pokémon.

Farbeagle markiert sein Revier mit einer Flüssigkeit,
die aus seiner Schweifspitze austritt. Es wurden über
5 000 unterschiedliche Markierungen entdeckt,
die dieses Pokémon hinterlassen hat.

Smeargle marca los límites de su territorio liberando un fluido
corporal por el extremo de la cola. En la actualidad se han
encontrado más de 5000 tipos de marcas distintas dejadas
por este Pokémon.

Smeargle delimita i confini del suo territorio con il fluido
corporeo secreto dalla punta della coda. Sono state
rinvenute ben 5000 diverse delimitazioni lasciate
da questo Pokémon.

Smeargle marks the boundaries of its territory using a body
fluid that leaks out from the tip of its tail. Over 5,000 different
marks left by this Pokémon have been found.

尻尾の　先から　にじみ出る　体液で
縄張りの　周りに　自分の　マークを　描く。
５０００　種類の　マークが　見つかっている。

シッポの　さきから　にじみでてくる
たいえきで　どくじの　マークを
えがいて　なわばりを　アピール。

꼬리의 끝에서 배어 나오는
체액으로 독자적인 마크를
그려 영역을 어필한다.

用從尾巴尖端慢慢滲出的
體液繪出獨有的標記，
用以宣告自己的地盤。

Ce Pokémon marque son territoire en peignant
à l’aide du liquide suintant du bout de sa queue.

Farbeagle markiert sein Revier mit einer
Flüssigkeit, die aus seiner Schweifspitze
austritt.

Smeargle marca los límites de su territorio
dibujando marcas personales con el fluido
que libera por la punta de la cola.

Delimita i confini del suo territorio dipingendo
segni particolari con il fluido corporeo
che secerne dalla punta della coda.

The unique creations produced by each
Smeargle are painted using the fluid that oozes
from its tail. This is how it marks its territory.

シッポの　先から　にじみでてくる
体液で　独自の　マークを
描いて　縄張りを　アピール。

用从尾巴尖尖慢慢渗出的
体液绘出独有的标记，
宣告自己的领地。

じぶんの　なわばりを　しめす　マークを
えがきちらすので　ドーブルの　おおい
まちの　かべは　らくがき　だらけ。

자신의 영역을 나타내는 마크를
여기저기 그리기 때문에 루브도가 많은
동네의 벽은 낙서투성이다.

會到處畫下展示自己地盤的標記，
所以在圖圖犬比較多的城市，
路邊牆上到處都是這些塗鴉。

Ce Pokémon peint pour marquer son territoire.
On reconnaît les villes peuplées de nombreux
Queulorior à leurs murs recouverts de graffitis.

Hinterlässt allerlei Markierungen, um sein Revier
zu kennzeichnen. Wände in Städten mit vielen
Farbeagle sind daher ziemlich vollgeschmiert.

Los muros de las ciudades donde viven
Smeargle están llenos de las marcas que van
dejando para indicar los límites de su territorio.

Marca il suo territorio dipingendo con la coda.
Nelle città che ospitano molti Smeargle, i muri
sono pieni di graffiti.

It draws symbols all over the place to mark its
territory. In towns with many Smeargle, the walls
are covered in graffiti.

自分の　縄張りを　示す　マークを
描き散らすので　ドーブルの　多い
街の　壁は　落書き　だらけ。

到处描绘昭示自己领地的标记，
所以在图图犬多的街边墙壁上
全都是这些乱涂乱画的。

シッポの　さきから　でる　たいえきは
ドーブルの　かんじょうに　よって
いろあいが　へんか　するのだ。

꼬리 끝에서 나오는 체액은
루브도의 감정에 따라
색조가 변화한다.

從尾巴尖端滲出的體液
會隨著圖圖犬的情緒變化
而出現不同的顏色。

La teinte du liquide qui coule de sa queue varie
en fonction de son humeur.

Der Farbton der Flüssigkeit, die aus seiner
Schweifspitze austritt, ändert sich je nach
Gefühlslage.

La tonalidad del líquido que libera por la cola
cambia en función de su estado anímico.

Dalla punta della coda secerne un fluido
corporeo la cui tonalità cambia in base
alle sue emozioni.

The fluid of Smeargle’s tail secretions changes
in the intensity of its hue as the Pokémon’s
emotions change.

シッポの　先から　でる　体液は
ドーブルの　感情に　よって
色合いが　変化　するのだ。

从尾巴前端渗出的体液
会随着图图犬情绪的
变化而呈现不同的颜色。

シッポの　さきから　でる　たいえきで
マークを　えがく。　マークに　よっては
マニアに　たかねで　とりひきされる。

꼬리 끝에서 나오는 체액으로
마크를 그린다. 마크에 따라서는
마니아에게 비싼 값에 거래된다.

會用尾巴前端分泌出的液體
畫下標記。其中有些標記會
吸引愛好者以高價買賣。

Il se sert du liquide qui sort de sa queue pour
dessiner sa marque. Ses fans s’arrachent ses
plus beaux tracés à prix d’or.

Mit der Flüssigkeit, die aus seiner Schweifspitze
austritt, hinterlässt es Markierungen. Die besten
werden unter Fans zu hohen Preisen gehandelt.

Dibuja marcas con el líquido que secreta por la
cola. Algunos de sus admiradores han llegado a
pagar auténticas fortunas por ellas.

Traccia dei segni con il fluido prodotto dalla
punta della coda. Gli appassionati comprano
le sue opere a caro prezzo.

It draws symbols with the fluid that oozes from
the tip of its tail. Depending on the symbol,
Smeargle fanatics will pay big money for them.

シッポの　先から　でる　体液で
マークを　えがく。　マークに　よっては
マニアに　高値で　取引される。

会用尾巴前端渗出的体液画下标记。
对于有些标记，爱好者会以高价买卖。

ability.effect:
This Pokémon cannot be confused.

If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

ability.effect:
This Pokémon's moves have 1.5× their power if their base power is 60 or less.

This includes moves of variable power, such as hidden power and magnitude, when their power is 60 or less.  helping hand's power boost is taken into account for any move, as is defense curl's power boost for rollout.
ability.short_effect: Strengthens moves of 60 base power or less to 1.5× their power.

ability.effect:
After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.

If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
ability.short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

move.name: sketch
move.effect:
Permanently replaces itself with the target's last used move.  If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.
move.short_effect: Permanently becomes the target's last used move.

move permanently.

move permanently.

Copies the foe’s last move
permanently.

the move last used
by the foe, then
disappears.

It enables the user
to learn a move used
by the foe.
Once used, the move
Sketch disappears.
